img.style: width: 570px; height: auto !important; max-height: auto !important; border: none;

h1.style: text-align: center; line-height: 1.1; font-weight: bold; color: #0d6cb9; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 24px; margin: 10px 0;

p.style: line-height: 1.4; color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; margin: 10px 0;
line-height: 1.4; color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; margin: 10px 0;

img.p: Parents and Staff of Karnes City ISD,

p.style: line-height: .9; color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; margin: 10px 0;
line-height: 1.4; color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; margin: 10px 0;

img.p: By staying apart for the time being, DISTRICT is working to ensure that we are limiting the spread of COVID-19 in our community. In service of this, I want to share a one-minute video that reminds us of the most important actions we can take as individuals to reduce risk for ourselves and others: Practice social distancing Wash your hands Stay home as much as you can, especially if you have a cough, fever, or shortness of breath

p.style: line-height: 1.4; color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; margin: 10px 0;
line-height: 1.4; color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; margin: 10px 0;

img.p: I encourage you to watch this video with your family, and be sure to share it with family and friends on social media and via email.

p.style: line-height: 1.4; color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; margin: 10px 0;
line-height: 1.4; color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; margin: 10px 0;

img.p: Even though we are currently apart, we look forward to coming back together as a community soon.

p.style: line-height: 1.4; color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; margin: 10px 0;
line-height: 1.4; color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; margin: 10px 0;
line-height: 1.4; color: #000000; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: left; margin: 10px 0;
